other_title: Children Who Chase Lost Voices from Deep Below
I bambini che inseguono le stelle (Italian)
Los niños que buscan voces perdidas (Spanish)
Los niños que persiguen las estrellas (Spanish)
plot: The story centers on Asuna, a girl who spends her solitary days listening to the mysterious music emanating from the crystal radio she received from her father as a memento. However, she embarks on a journey of adventure to meet a boy again, and thus comes to know the cruelty and beauty of the world, as well as loss.
